sub_title: GM Trading & Supply Transformation & Program Delivery at Shell
summary: I have more than 17 years’ experience and a successful track record in driving organizational change through creating, driving and delivering complex change and business improvement programs at large scale. Experienced in managing multiple project portfolios and relationships (internal and external) simultaneously across global organisations. Understanding the business (needs) comes natural for me, as I am highly curious, have commercial acumen and connect easily with diverse groups. This understanding, in combination with my high work ethic, strong stakeholder management and engagement skills, makes that I have a strong track record in delivery of goals and a credible business partner. Experienced in leading and developing multi-functional, diverse, international teams. I am energetic, collaborative and get energy out of working with a team and help them to achieve something that they never thought was possible.

education.degree_name: P30 Foundation in Portfolio, Programme and Project Offices

school.name: Center for Right Relationship, California, USA

publications.name: Wie wil je zijn? Integer blijven, ook als het moeilijk wordt

authors.headline: GM Trading & Supply Transformation & Program Delivery at Shell
GM Trading & Supply Transformation & Program Delivery at Shell

profile_positions.description: In this role I am accountable to drive and deliver a major transformation in T&S, that consists of multiple portfolios in the area of risk (Market/Credit Risk/Operational Risk), Carbon Management, Information/Data/Technology (ETRMs), and new business models. Responsible for improving the performance of the organisation by building robust transformation & project capability. Leading valuation and prioritisation of all programs and projects. Managing 3rd party contractor spend and relationships with external global client leaders. Community Leader of 11 senior direct reports (transformation leads/PMs/PMOs/change managers), overall team size 30+ FTE globally (Singapore, Houston, UK, Manilla).
profile_positions.title: GM Trading & Supply Transformation & Program Delivery

profile_positions.description:
About the organisation:
Shell Trading & Supply (T&S) is one of the largest energy Trading operations in the world. With around 7000 employees worldwide. T&S combines a global network of trading companies, industry leading shipping and maritime capabilities, and an integrated network of supply and distribution activities to act as the central nervous system for Royal Dutch Shell. We have trading offices in London, Houston, Singapore, Dubai and Rotterdam and more than 125 distribution terminals and outside supply points in around 25 countries. 

About my role:
Overall responsibility for all aspects of integrated capability building for Crude and Products Trading, Including:
*Accountable for development and delivery of the global strategic organisational effectiveness plan for Crude & Products Trading in Shell, working closely with the Vice Presidents of the businesses. 
*Personal & Team Effectiveness of the global Products & Crude Trading Leadership Teams
* Accountable for development and delivery of the global Learning plan for Crude & Products Trading
* Programme & Change Management for key digital projects in Crude & Products Trading
* Accountable & Responsible for our flagship Trader Development Programme
* Active member of the Trading & Supply Learning & Organisational Development Leadership Team
profile_positions.title: Learning & Organisational Development Manager Crude & Products Trading

profile_positions.description:
About the organisation
The global Trading & Supply business is one of the largest energy trading operations in the world. The key hubs are Dubai, Houston, London, Rotterdam and Singapore, trading in crude oil, natural gas, LNG, electrical power, refined products, chemical feedstocks and environmental products. This combined with an integrated network of supply and distribution activities and an industry leading shipping and maritime capability. The T&S Operations organisation consists of approximately 2900 people, located in 35 countries, working together with a common focus, which include: the efficient running of physical assets (terminals) while ensuring timely delivery of fuel to Shell customers, a structured approach to optimising molecules in the supply chain, knowledge of trading tools and techniques, as well as commercial acumen, Continuous Improvement in the management of our processes. 

My role as Learning Manager
-	As Learning Manager, I am responsible for partnering with the T&S Operations Leadership Team and business Subject Matter Experts to drive enterprise-wide capability building, as well as compliance and competence assurance in line with the T&S business priorities, to deliver a top-quartile learning experience for approximately 2900 employees in 35 countries. 
-	I work closely with the HR managers to ensure alignment with and contribution to the T&S Operations People plan and global T&S learning strategy. 
-	Responsible for a global team of Learning Advisors, who partner with the business in addressing employee development needs that will contribute to an improvement in business performance and deliver quality global learning projects. 
-	I am an active member of the Trading & Supply Learning Leadership Team.
profile_positions.title: Learning Manager Trading & Suply Operations

profile_positions.description: In my role as learning advisor, I support the Shell Ethics & Compliance (E&C) learning journey to achieve an effective E&C program.  I am responsible for the successful delivery of part of the Ethics & Compliance (E&C) Learning portfolio for the Group. My tasks are to manage the portfolio, including portfolio rationalization, program design & delivery through internal Subject Matter Experts (SMEs) and external vendors in line with Group E&C identified risks and the global learning roadmap. And to identify learning needs and ensure fit for purpose solutions that work in the Shell landscape. The E&C learning landscape is approximately 155.000 learners, both Shell staff and third parties.
profile_positions.title: Learning Advisor Ethics & Compliance

profile_positions.description: As a manager of Incompany I am responsible for managing a group of 10 junior consultants and I am part of the Management Team of Schouten & Nelissen Incompany.
profile_positions.title: Manager Incompany

profile_positions.description:
I am part of the consultant organization focused on management development, communication skills training and customer focus programs for large multinational organizations in various industries. Main responsibilities are project management of large training projects, acquiring new business, designing and implementing new training courses, training of large groups as well as coaching individual participants. 

Some key accomplishments:
•	Acquisition, design  and project management for a management development program of two multinationals. Both multiyear programs are specifically tailored to the client using the latest blended learning methods such as online assessment, e-coaching and online modules and have over 100 participants. Program contains the modules communication skills for managers, personal leadership, situational leadership, performance management.
•	Responsible for the content of an open course ‘communication skills’ training delivered in English, focusing on Dutch based expats.
•	Responsible for delivery of key modules of ‘Train the Trainer’ course in China, mainly for people working at large multinational companies in China. Working 3 to 4 times per annum for 2 weeks locally (Shanghai and Beijing). 
•	Expert in tailoring programs to participants of different generations. Have held various workshops (in collaboration with Belgian University of Leuven) on the topic to colleagues and clients.
profile_positions.title: Consultant Learning and Development

profile_positions.description: Responsible for four trainers from Schouten & Nelissen who successfully transitioned from a role as a pure trainer to a role as both a trainer and advisor with sales targets.
profile_positions.title: Leermanager

profile_positions.description: I am part of the consultant organization focused on management development, communication skills training and customer focus programs for large multinational organizations in various industries. Main responsibilities are acquiring new business, designing and implementing new training courses, training of large groups as well as coaching individual participants.
profile_positions.title: Trainer/advisor

profile_positions.description: Als intercedente bemiddelde ik tussen gezondheidszorgpersoneel (verpleeghulpen tot artsen) en gezondheidszorginstellingen. Ik was verantwoordelijk voor acquisitie klanten, relatiebeheer klanten, intakegesprekken, begeleiden & coachen van employees, inwerken nieuwe collega's, werven van nieuwe employees.
profile_positions.title: Intercedente

volunteer_experiences.description: Volunteer work, by giving workshops (‘how to make a conversation’, ‘how to deal with difficult people’ and ‘how to prepare for a job interview) to people living in Amsterdam.

volunteer_experiences.role: Vice-president of the Dutch board of SPS NIP (student association)
volunteer_experiences.description:
•	Vice-president of the Dutch board of SPS NIP, the organization for all Dutch Psychology students (>9000 members), part of the Dutch National Association for Psychologists (NIP). The SPS focuses on linking master students to the business world. 

•	Member of the European board of Psychology students (EFPSA). I worked with board members from all over Europe on improving the quality of  psychology education in Europe.
